title: All Saints' Secrets
description: Mystery / Suspense / Humor – Saints Mystery Series: Book Two“All Saints' Secrets” is the follow-up to the Amazon Best Selling novella: “To Murder a Saint”“After her death the kids used to say her ghost haunted the plantation.”The bayou holds many secrets. One of them is what really happened to Lisette, a beautiful Creole teenager who died on the last day of school. Everybody in Fanchon’s reclusive bayou parish knows Lisette died in a boating accident, but when the police take a closer look, they unearth the dead girl and find a surprise in her grave. Fanchon tries to stay out of it, but the Saints keep pulling her back, with a secret sure to change her life. This latest Saints adventure takes Fanchon from New York to New Orleans for Halloween and to one of Louisiana’s most beautiful plantations, Oak Alley.It is recommended that the books in the Saint series be read in order starting with: “To Murder a Saint.”
author: Nicole Loughan
